Colors

All Sass color variables prefixed with $color-. This makes it easy to figure out what a variable is for later.

Primary

$color-pacific-blue
#0099cc
$color-rio-grande
#c4d600
$color-oslo-gray
#888b8d
$color-white
#FFF
$color-black
#000

Grays

$color-tundora
#464646
$color-silver
#bbb
$color-alto
#ddd
$color-gallery
#eee
$color-alabaster
#f7f7f7
